remarks: Derivative of the reciprocal of a function.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
dvrecg.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. { RR , CC } ) $.
dvrecg.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
dvrecg.b $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> B e. ( CC \ { 0 } ) ) $.
dvrecg.c $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> C e. V ) $.
dvrecg.db $e |- ( ph -> ( S _D ( x e. X |-> B ) ) = ( x e. X |-> C ) ) $.
dvrecg $p |- ( ph -> ( S _D ( x e. X |-> ( A / B ) ) ) = ( x e. X |-> -u ( ( A x. C ) / ( B ^ 2 ) ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d S x $.
$d V x $.
$d X x $.
$d ph x $.
